product_name: Exploding Kittens Card Board Game Party Get-together Drinking Cards Game
description:
Hologram ensures Authenticity.
Exploding kittens is a card game for people who are into kittens and explosions and laser beams and sometimes goats.
Family-friendly, party game for 2-5 players (up to 9 players with 2 decks)
This is the most-backed project in Kickstarter history and all cards feature illustrations by the oatmeal.
Includes 56 cards (2.5 x 3.5 inches), box, and instructions.
This box, like 99.99% of boxes, does not Meow.
Skill level: Beginner
kitten, cards, party, friends, fun

What Is This?
Exploding Kittens is a highly-strategic, kitty-powered version of Russian roulette. It was the most-funded game in the history of Kickstarter and has paved the way for peace and tranquility in the modern world. It also features cards illustrated by The Oatmeal.

How It WorksÔºö
1.You Draw Cards
   You put cards on the table and take turns drawing from them.
2.Until You Explode
   If you draw an Exploding Kitten, you explode and are out of the game.
3.Unless
   You can avoid exploding if you play a Defuse Card. Defuse Cards distract the Exploding Kittens with things like laser 
   pointers, kitten yoga, and catnip sandwiches.
4.Or
   You can also play various cards to skip your turn, attack other players, peek at the deck, or secretly relocate an 
   Exploding Kitten Card.

The first step is to install the game board.
The second step is to install the base frame.
The third step is to place the penguin.
The fourth step, the installation is complete, start the game.
Gameplay introduction
1. Place the small ice cubes on the chassis and place the little penguin on it.
2. The player decides who will start first and uses the turntable to determine the color of the ice.
3. Tap the ice cube of the corresponding color with a hammer, and pay attention to control the strength.
4. Take turns to play in turn, and finally whoever makes the little penguin fall from the ice is the loser.

Name: Scrabble Board Game
Condition: Brand New
Product Dimension: 37cm x 27cm x 5cm 


Best interactive game during festive gathering (e.g. Christmas) 
Scrabble is a board and tile game where it includes two to four players
competing in a form of words with lettered tiles on a 225 square board.
Words are required to be spelled out by letters on the tiles interlocking each other to form a crossword puzzle. 

How to win in a scrabble board game? 
Scoring as the game advances is possible both horizontally and vertically
the one with higher scores registered by forming two or more interlocking words at the same time.
At the end of the game, when one player has no tiles or the board is deadlocked,
the player who has scored the greatest number of points is the winner.
Values of unused letters left to players are totalled and deducted from their scores.

The Resistance: Avalon pits the forces of Good and Evil in a battle to control the future of civilization. Arthur represents the future of Britain, a promise of prosperity and honor, yet hidden among his brave warriors are Mordred's unscrupulous minions. Merlin alone knows the agents of evil, but he must speak of this only in riddles. If his true identity is discovered, all will be lost.

Scrabble is a popular English text board game in the West. Vocabulary is listed horizontally and vertically in crosswords, and must be included in a common dictionary. Different letters have different scores, which are based on the frequency of occurrence in standard written English. For example, E and O that appear frequently are only worth 1 point, but Q and Z, which are not commonly used, are worth 10 points. There are grids of different colors on the board, participants can get extra points. 1game Board, 100 game word cards,4 word calipers and 1word card pocket.

[PRODUCT FEATURES] Classic Jenga stands the test of time: It‚Äôs fun, not fussyKeep the tower from crashing down: It takes skill, strategy, and luckPlay solo or with a crowd: Challenge yourself or play with friendsGenuine 54 pieces of hardwood blocks: Simple, solid, and timeless
[SHORT PRODUCT DESCRIPTION] Want a game experience that combines friends, skill, suspense, laughter, and maybe a little luck?  You got to get the Jenga game!  It's the classic block-stacking, stack-crashing game of JENGA! How will you stack up against the law of gravity? Stack the wooden blocks in a sturdy tower, then take turns pulling out blocks one by one until the whole stack crashes down. Is your hand steady enough to pull out the last block before the tower collapses? If it is, you'll win at JENGA!

You strap your victim's hand to, delivering a small electric shock or vibrate when it thinks a lie is being toldÔºåBut these are virtual currents that don't harm the body.
